definitions.definition: Since , because , in light of the fact.
examples: Now all the children have grown up and left, the house is very quiet.
Now that my sister has gotten rid of their cat, we can go to her house this coming Thanksgiving.
We can play football now that the rain has stopped.
Now that you mention it, I am kind of hungry.
Now that we're all here, let's start the meeting.

main_definition: ( often with that ) Since , because , in light of the fact.
